tv.ouya.console.api
Class Product

java.lang.Object
  tv.ouya.console.api.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Parcelable
public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable

Represents a product available for in-app purchase. Product is a parcelable object used for data-transfer that contains data about the product.
